pr_title: [build] Follow-up to #2088 bump to Gradle 6.3 : 3.3 specifics

timeline.bodyText: I am surprised that we need to duplicate it here o_O OSGI is the gift that keeps on giving 😂
timeline.author: bsideup

replies.bodyText: it otherwise complains about reactor.shaded which IIRC is linked to the wonky stubs stuff we did for StackWalker-and-al
replies.author: simonbasle

replies.bodyText:
it only applies to reactor-tools, right?
what if we explicitly exclude reactor.shaded.*?
replies.author: bsideup

replies.bodyText: re StackWalker - not the case, but reactor-tools' shading of ByteBuddy
replies.author: bsideup

timeline.message:
[build] Follow-up to #2088 : 3.3 specifics of bump to Gradle 6.3

 - build-scan plugin (added in 3.3) has been upgraded but must now be
 applied in settings.gradle
 - unbroken-dome.test-sets plugin must be bumped to version 3.0.0 for
 Gradle 6.3 compatibility
 - Bump of blockhound to 1.0.3 to avoid `reactor.shaded` version of
 bytebuddy (which confuses BND)
 - Exclude blockhound in core's BDN Export-Package
